mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outbox (aggregate_type, aggregate_id, type, payload) VALUES (#{aggregateType}, #{aggregateId}, #{type}, #{payload})
mapper.update: UPDATE outbox SET id = #{id}, aggregate_type = #{aggregateType}, aggregate_id = #{aggregateId}, type = #{type}, payload = #{payload}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM outbox WHERE aggregate_type = #{type} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM outbox as o JOIN ( SELECT id FROM outbox WHERE aggregate_type = 'notification' and deleted = 0 LIMIT #{_skiprows}, #{_pagesize} ) as temp on temp.id = o.id ORDER BY created_date ASC
